cards.name: Artificer's Intuition
cards.text: {U}, Discard an artifact card: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

foreignNames.name: Eingebung des Handwerkers
foreignNames.text: {U}, wirf eine Artefaktkarte aus deiner Hand ab: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Artefaktkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 1 oder weniger, zeige diese Karte offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Intuición del artífice
foreignNames.text: {U}, descartar una carta de artefacto de tu mano: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de artefacto con coste de maná convertido de 1 o menos, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Intuition de l'artificier
foreignNames.text: {U}, Défaussez-vous d'une carte d'artefact de votre main : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'artefact avec un coût converti de mana de 1 ou moins, révélez-la et mettez-la dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Intuito dell'Artefice
foreignNames.text: {U}, Scarta una carta artefatto dalla tua mano: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegli una carta artefatto con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 1, rivela quella carta e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 工匠の直感
foreignNames.text: {U}, あなたの手札からアーティファクト・カードを１枚捨てる：あなたのライブラリーから、点数でみたマナ・コストが１以下のアーティファクト・カードを１枚探し、そのカードを公開してあなたの手札に加える。その後、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: Intuição do Artesão
foreignNames.text: {U}, Descarte um card de artefato de sua mão: Procure em seu grimório por um card de artefato com custo de mana convertido menor ou igual a 1, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: 神器师的直觉
foreignNames.text: {U}，从你手上弃掉一张神器牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

cards.originalText: {U}, Discard an artifact card from your hand: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Beacon of Tomorrows
cards.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern des Morgigen
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl erhält nach diesem Zug einen zusätzlichen Zug. Mische den Leitstern des Morgigen in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Schaust du in sein Licht, trifft dich der Blick der Geschichte.

foreignNames.name: Faro del mañana
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo toma un turno adicional después de éste. Baraja el Faro del mañana en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Basta con contemplar su luz para sentir el peso de la historia.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de l'Avenir
foreignNames.text: Le joueur ciblé joue un tour supplémentaire après celui-ci. Mélangez le Flambeau de l'Avenir à la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Fixer sa lumière équivaut à subir le regard de l'histoire.

foreignNames.name: Faro del Domani
foreignNames.text: Il giocatore bersaglio gioca un altro turno dopo questo. Rimescola il Faro del Domani nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Scrutando nella sua luce si incontra lo sguardo della storia.

foreignNames.name: 明日の標
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、このターンの後に追加のターンを得る。明日の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 光の中を見ることは、すなわち歴史とまみえることだ。

foreignNames.name: Guia dos Amanhãs
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo joga um turno extra após este turno. Embaralhe Guia dos Amanhãs no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Olhar para sua luz é encarar o olhar da história.

foreignNames.name: 来日信标
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。将来日信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 眼神与光芒相遇时，你将和历史对望。

cards.originalText: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.

cards.name: Blinkmoth Infusion
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.
cards.flavor: Power begets power.

rulings.text: If you control no artifacts, Blinkmoth Infusion costs twelve generic mana and two blue mana to cast.
Blinkmoth Infusion untaps all artifacts on the battlefield, not just artifacts you control.

foreignNames.name: Blinkmotten-Infusion
foreignNames.text:
Affinität zu Artefakten (Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Ausspielen für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.)
Enttappe alle Artefakte.
foreignNames.flavor: Macht erzeugt Macht.

foreignNames.name: Infusión de polillas titilantes
foreignNames.text:
Afinidad por artefactos. (Este hechizo te cuesta {1} menos para jugarlo por cada artefacto que controles.)
Endereza todos los artefactos.
foreignNames.flavor: El poder engendra poder.

foreignNames.name: Décoction de scintimite
foreignNames.text:
Affinité pour les artefacts (Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à jouer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.)
Dégagez tous les artefacts.
foreignNames.flavor: La puissance engendre la puissance.

foreignNames.name: Infusione di Lampidotteri
foreignNames.text:
Affinità con gli artefatti (Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere giocata per ogni artefatto che controlli.)
STAPpa tutti gli artefatti.
foreignNames.flavor: Il potere genera potere.

foreignNames.name: ちらつき蛾の注入
foreignNames.text:
親和（アーティファクト） （この呪文をプレイするためのコストは、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。）
すべてのアーティファクトをアンタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: 力は力を生む。

foreignNames.name: Infusão de Moscolumes
foreignNames.text:
Afinidade por artefatos (Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para jogar para cada artefato que você controla.)
Desvira todos os artefatos.
foreignNames.flavor: Poder gera poder.

foreignNames.name: 光蛾灌输
foreignNames.text:
神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）
重置所有神器。
foreignNames.flavor: 力量产生更多力量。

cards.originalText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.

cards.name: Bringer of the Blue Dawn
cards.text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw two cards.

foreignNames.name: Bringer des Blauen Morgens
foreignNames.text:
Du kannst {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} bezahlen, anstatt die Manakosten des Bringers des Blauen Morgens zu bezahlen.
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du 2 Karten ziehen.

foreignNames.name: Adalid del amanecer azul
foreignNames.text:
Puedes pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} en lugar de pagar el coste de maná del Adalid del amanecer azul.
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes robar dos cartas.

foreignNames.name: Annonciateur de l'Aube bleue
foreignNames.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} à la place du coût de mana de l'Annonciateur de l'Aube bleue.
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez piocher deux cartes.

foreignNames.name: Portatore dell'Alba Blu
foreignNames.text:
Puoi spendere {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} invece di pagare il costo di mana del Portatore dell'Alba Blu.
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi pescare due carte.

foreignNames.name: 青の夜明けの運び手
foreignNames.text:
あなたは青の夜明けの運び手のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}を支払ってもよい。
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはカードを２枚引いてもよい。

foreignNames.name: Portador da Aurora Azul
foreignNames.text:
Você pode pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} em vez de pagar o custo de mana do Portador da Aurora Azul.
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, você pode comprar dois cards.

foreignNames.name: 蓝曙光信使
foreignNames.text:
你可支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付蓝曙光信使的法术力费用。
践踏
在你的维持开始时，你可以抓两张牌。

cards.originalText:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay Bringer of the Blue Dawn's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw two cards.

cards.name: Condescend
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: You must be able to target another spell to cast Condescend. Condescend can’t target itself.
You scry 2 even if the spell’s controller pays {X}.

foreignNames.name: Herablassen
foreignNames.text:
Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {X} bezahlt.
Hellsicht 2 (Betrachte die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek. Lege eine beliebige Anzahl davon in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest oben darauf.)

foreignNames.name: Condescender
foreignNames.text:
Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {X}.
Adivinar 2 (Mira las dos primeras cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Pon cualquier número de ellas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca y el resto, en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignNames.name: Condescendance
foreignNames.text:
Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paye {X}.
Regard 2 (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignNames.name: Acconsentire
foreignNames.text:
Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore spenda {X}.
Profetizzare 2 (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Metti un qualsiasi numero di esse in fondo al tuo grimorio e le rimanenti in cima a esso nell'ordine che preferisci.)

foreignNames.name: 卑下
foreignNames.text:
呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{X}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
占術 ２ （あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見る。そのうち望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、望む順番で置く。）

foreignNames.name: Condescender
foreignNames.text:
Anula a mágica alvo a menos que seu controlador pague {X}.
Vidência 2 (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer número deles no fundo de seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignNames.name: 睥睨
foreignNames.text:
除非目标咒语之操控者支付{X}，否则将其反击。
占卜2（检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置于你牌库底，其余则置于你牌库顶；你决定牌的顺序。）

cards.originalText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Disruption Aura
cards.text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."
cards.flavor: Vedalken weapons sold to outsiders are as dependable as the vedalken themselves.

rulings.text: Mana cost includes any requirements for colored mana, although most artifacts don’t have any color requirements.
If the enchanted artifact has X in its mana cost, X is 0.

foreignNames.name: Störende Aura
foreignNames.text: Das verzauberte Artefakt hat „Opfere dieses Artefakt zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments, falls du nicht seine Manakosten bezahlst."
foreignNames.flavor: Vedalken-Waffen, die an Fremde verkauft werden, sind so zuverlässig wie die Vedalken selbst.

foreignNames.name: Aura de disrupción
foreignNames.text: El artefacto encantado tiene "Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica este artefacto a menos que pagues su coste de maná."
foreignNames.flavor: Las armas vedalken vendidas a los extranjeros son tan confiables como los mismos vedalken.

foreignNames.name: Aura de perturbation
foreignNames.text: L'artefact enchanté a « Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez cet artefact à moins que vous ne payiez son coût de mana. »
foreignNames.flavor: Les armes que les vedalkens vendent aux étrangers sont aussi fiables que les vedalkens eux-mêmes.

foreignNames.name: Aura della Distruzione
foreignNames.text: L'artefatto incantato ha "All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica questo artefatto a meno che tu paghi il suo costo di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Le armi vedalken vendute agli stranieri sono affidabili quanto gli stessi vedalken.

foreignNames.name: 撹乱のオーラ
foreignNames.text: エンチャントされているアーティファクトは、「あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがこのアーティファクトのマナ・コストを支払わないかぎり、このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる。」の能力を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: 部外者に売られたヴィダルケンの武器は、ヴィダルケンそのものと同じぐらい頼りになる。

foreignNames.name: Aura de Disrupção
foreignNames.text: O artefato encantado tem "No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique este artefato a menos que você pague seu custo de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: As armas que os vedalkeanos vendem aos estrangeiros são tão confiáveis quanto eles próprios.

foreignNames.name: 散裂灵气
foreignNames.text: 受此结界的神器具有「在你的维持开始时，除非你支付此神器的法术力费用，否则牺牲之。」
foreignNames.flavor: 维多肯族卖给外地人的武器，就跟维多肯族一样值得信赖。

cards.originalText: Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."

cards.name: Early Frost
cards.text: Tap up to three target lands.
cards.flavor: Under its mists, the earth sleeps.

foreignNames.name: Früher Frost
foreignNames.text: Tappe bis zu drei Länder deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Unter seinen Nebeln schläft die Erde.

foreignNames.name: Escarcha matinal
foreignNames.text: Gira hasta tres tierras objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Bajo su bruma, la tierra duerme.

foreignNames.name: Gel précoce
foreignNames.text: Engagez jusqu'à trois terrains ciblés.
foreignNames.flavor: La terre sommeille sous la brume.

foreignNames.name: Prime Gelate
foreignNames.text: TAPpa fino a tre terre bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Sotto la nebbia, la terra riposa.

foreignNames.name: 早霜
foreignNames.text: 土地を最大３枚まで対象とし、それらをタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: その霧の下で大地は眠る。

foreignNames.name: Geada Precoce
foreignNames.text: Vire até três terrenos alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Por baixo de suas névoas, a terra dorme.

foreignNames.name: 早霜
foreignNames.text: 横置至多三个目标地。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地在寒雾中沉睡。

cards.originalText: Tap up to three target lands.

cards.name: Eyes of the Watcher
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: You do the scrying at the end of the ability’s resolution (assuming you pay {1}).

foreignNames.name: Augen des Beobachters
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei spielst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erhältst du Hellsicht 2. (Betrachte die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek und lege dann eine beliebige Anzahl davon in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest oben darauf.)

foreignNames.name: Ojos del observador
foreignNames.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo instantáneo o conjuro, puedes pagar {1}. Si lo haces, adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier número de ellas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca y el resto, en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignNames.name: Les yeux du gardien
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel, vous pouvez payer {1}. Si vous faites ainsi, regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignNames.name: Occhi dell'Osservatore
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia istantaneo o stregoneria, puoi spendere {1}. Se lo fai, profetizzare 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi metti un qualsiasi numero di esse in fondo al tuo grimorio e le rimanenti in cima a esso nell'ordine che preferisci.)

foreignNames.name: 見張る者の目
foreignNames.text: あなたがインスタント呪文かソーサリー呪文をプレイするたび、あなたは{1}を支払ってもよい。そうした場合、「占術 ２」を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、その後、そのうち望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、望む順番で置く。）

foreignNames.name: Olhos do Observador
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você jogar uma mágica instantânea ou de feitiço, você pode pagar {1}. Se o fizer, vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer número deles no fundo de seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignNames.name: 看守者之眼
foreignNames.text: 每当你使用瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置于你牌库底，其余则置于你牌库顶；你决定牌的顺序。）

cards.originalText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Fold into Aether
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, its controller may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Æther portals drift across Mirrodin's surface, dragging creatures across time and space.

rulings.text: If the spell isn’t countered (because it’s a spell that can’t be countered, for example), nothing happens.
If your Fold into Aether counters a spell you control, you get to put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Falte im Äther
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Falls du dies tust, kann der Beherrscher dieses Zauberspruchs eine Kreaturenkarte aus seiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.
foreignNames.flavor: Ätherportale wehen über Mirrodins Oberfläche und ziehen dabei Kreaturen durch Zeit und Raum.

foreignNames.name: Plegar hacia el éter
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Si lo haces, el controlador de ese hechizo puede poner en juego una carta de criatura de su mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Los portales al éter flotan sobre la superficie de Mirrodin, arrastrando criaturas a través del tiempo y el espacio.

foreignNames.name: Repli dans l'Aether
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Si vous faites ainsi, le contrôleur de ce sort peut mettre en jeu une carte de créature de sa main.
foreignNames.flavor: Les portails d'Aether glissent à la surface de Mirrodin, projetant les créatures dans l'espace et le temps.

foreignNames.name: Avviluppare nell'Etere
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Se lo fai, il controllore di quella magia può mettere in gioco una carta creatura dalla propria mano.
foreignNames.flavor: I portali eterei vanno alla deriva lungo la superficie di Mirrodin, trascinando le creature nel tempo e nello spazio.

foreignNames.name: 霊気への折り込み
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。そうした場合、その呪文のコントローラーは自分の手札にあるクリーチャー・カードを１枚場に出してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 霊気の扉はミラディン中を漂いまわり、生き物を時間も空間も飛び越えて捕まえる。

foreignNames.name: Dobrar em Éter
foreignNames.text: Anula a mágica alvo. Se você o fizer, o controlador daquela mágica pode colocar em jogo um card de criatura de sua própria mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os portais de Éter flutuam pela superfície de Mirrodin, dragando criaturas pelo tempo e pelo espaço.

foreignNames.name: 乙太收束
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。若你如此作，该咒语的操控者可以从其手上将一张生物牌放置进场。
foreignNames.flavor: 乙太时空通道在秘罗地表面游移，被卷入的生物将在时空之间迷途。

cards.originalText: Counter target spell. If you do, that spell's controller may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.

cards.name: Hoverguard Sweepers
cards.text:
Flying
When Hoverguard Sweepers enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: They only appear in emergencies, and emergencies never last long.

foreignNames.name: Aufräumender Schwebgardist
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Aufräumende Schwebgardist ins Spiel kommt, kannst du bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurückschicken.
foreignNames.flavor: Sie tauchen nur in Notlagen auf, und Notlagen dauern nie lange.

foreignNames.name: Barredores aeroguarda
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando los Barredores aeroguarda entren en juego, puedes regresar hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: Sólo aparecen en caso de emergencia, y las emergencias nunca duran mucho.

foreignNames.name: Balayeurs aérogardes
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand les Balayeurs aérogardes arrivent en jeu, vous pouvez renvoyer jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans la main de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: Ils n'apparaissent qu'en cas d'urgence, et celles-ci ne durent jamais longtemps.

foreignNames.name: Spazzatori Aerocustodi
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando gli Spazzatori Aerocustodi entrano in gioco, puoi far riprendere in mano ai proprietari fino a due creature bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Appaiono solo in casi di emergenza e le emergenze non durano mai a lungo.

foreignNames.name: 空護りの掃討者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
空護りの掃討者が場に出たとき、クリーチャーを最大２体まで対象とする。あなたはそれらをオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。

cards.name: Dance of Many
cards.text:
When Dance of Many enters the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature.
When Dance of Many leaves the battlefield, exile the token.
When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Dance of Many.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dance of Many unless you pay {U}{U}.

rulings.text: Destroying the creature that was copied will not cause the token creature to be destroyed as well.
Each Dance of Many is associated only with its token creature. If one Dance leaves the battlefield, only the corresponding token is affected, not all tokens from all instances of Dance of Many.

The ability is targeted and checks the validity of the target when put on the stack and when resolving. If the creature is not still there when the copy ability resolves, the ability doesn’t resolve and no token is put onto the battlefield. This card remains on the battlefield as an enchantment with no token.
The mana cost is copied.
Treat the token as entering the battlefield as a copy of the chosen creature. If that creature normally gets counters when entering the battlefield, the token creature gets counters.

If Dance of Many leaves the battlefield before its first ability has resolved, its second ability will trigger and do nothing. Then its first ability will resolve and put a token onto the battlefield. That token won’t have any connection to a Dance of Many permanent, so it won’t be exiled when a Dance of Many leaves the battlefield.

Wenn der große Tanz das Spiel verlässt, begrabe die Spielsteinkreatur und umgekehrt.

cards.originalText:

cards.name: Deflection
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
cards.flavor:
Up and down,
over and through,
back around—
the joke's on you.

rulings.text: The target of a spell that targets another spell on the stack can be changed to any other spell on the stack, even if the new target will resolve before the spell does.
You can’t make a spell which is on the stack target itself.

You can choose to make a spell on the stack target this spell (if such a target choice would be legal had the spell been cast while this spell was on the stack). The new target for the deflected spell is not chosen until this spell resolves. This spell is still on the stack when new targets are selected for the spell.
Once the spell resolves, the new target is considered to be targeted by the deflected spell. This will trigger any effects which trigger on being targeted.
This does not check if the current target is legal. It just checks if the spell has a single target.
You choose the spell to target on announcement, but you pick the new target for that spell on resolution.
If there is no other legal target for the spell, this does not change the target.
This only targets the spell being changed, not the original or new target of the spell it is affecting.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Deflection, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Deflection.

foreignNames.name: Ablenkung
foreignNames.text: Ein Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl, der ein einzelnes Ziel hat, wird nun auf ein neues, gültiges Ziel Deiner Wahl umgeleitet.

cards.originalText: Target spell with a single target now targets a new legal target of your choice.

cards.name: Drain Power
cards.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

rulings.text: This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana from their mana pool and lands.
If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn’t a loyalty ability, (2) doesn’t target, and (3) could put mana into a player’s mana pool when it resolves.

foreignNames.name: Kraftsog

cards.originalText: Target player draws all mana from all lands he or she controls. Put all mana from that player's mana pool into yours.

cards.name: Hydroblast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.
cards.flavor:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can’t be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.
Hydroblast can target any spell or permanent, not just a red one. It checks the color of the target only on resolution.

cards.name: Juxtapose
cards.text: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.

rulings.text: First creatures are exchanged, then artifacts are exchanged. It’s possible that the same artifact creature may be involved in both exchanges.
No permanents are targeted by this effect, so permanents with Shroud may be exchanged this way.

If one of the players doesn’t control a creature at the time the exchange would be made, that part of the effect does nothing, but the exchange of artifacts will still happen. Similarly, if one of the players doesn’t control an artifact at the time the exchange would be made, that part of the effect does nothing.

foreignNames.name: Frontenwechsel
foreignNames.text:
Tausche mit einem Spieler Deiner Wahl die Kontrolle über die Kreatur mit den jeweils höchsten Spruchkosten, die ihr beherrscht. Wenn zwei oder mehrere Kreaturen gleich hohe Spruchkosten haben, kann ihr Beherrscher auswählen.
Tausche mit diesem Spieler die Kontrolle über ein Artefakt auf dieselbe Weise.

cards.originalText: Exchange with target player control of the creature with the highest total casting cost that you each control. rulings.text: If the creature Labyrinth Minotaur blocked is untapped at the time its controller’s next untap step begins, this ability has no effect. It won’t apply at some later time when that creature is tapped.

Labyrinth Minotaur doesn’t track the creature’s controller. If the affected creature changes controllers before its old controller’s next untap step, this ability will prevent it from being untapped during its new controller’s next untap step.

cards.name: Magical Hack
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.
You can’t change proper nouns (i.e. card names) such as “Island Fish Jasconius”.

Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.
It can be used to change a land’s type from one basic land type to another. For example, Forest can be changed to Island so it produces blue mana. It doesn’t change the name of any permanent.

foreignNames.name: Kupferstecher

cards.originalText: Change the text of target permanent or spell by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

cards.name: Magus of the Unseen
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.

rulings.text: You may target an untapped artifact with this ability.
The artifact taps after returning to the opponent (if it is not already tapped), so any abilities triggered off it tapping happen at that time.
You tap the artifact when you lose control of it for any reason — because Magus of the Unseen’s effect ends, or because a spell or ability causes another player to gain control of it.
The artifact will gain haste whether or not it’s a creature. Of course, if it’s not a creature, haste will have no particular effect.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

foreignNames.name: Kraftverlust
foreignNames.text: Der Zielspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht zusätzlich X ausgibt. Dieser Spieler muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis X bezahlt ist;wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

rulings.text: You don’t discard cards until Recall resolves. If you don’t have X cards in your hand at that time, you discard all the cards in your hand.

You choose a card in your graveyard for each card you discarded, then you put all cards chosen this way into your hand at the same time. cards.name: Seasinger

When you control no Islands, sacrifice Seasinger.

{T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls an Island for as long as you control Seasinger and Seasinger remains tapped.

rulings.text: You do not lose control of the stolen creature if it stops being a creature. You only lose control if Seasinger leaves your control or becomes untapped.

If a creature’s controller doesn’t control an Island, that creature is an illegal target. Whether that player controls an Island is checked both when Seasinger’s ability is activated and when it resolves. However, targeting restrictions aren’t checked continually while a spell or ability is on the stack.

Whether you control Seasinger is checked continually, starting when the ability is activated. If, before the ability resolves, there’s any point at which you don’t control Seasinger, the ability has no effect — even if you control Seasinger again by the time the ability resolves. The same is true regarding whether Seasinger remains tapped.

cards.name: Sleight of Mind
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: You can’t Sleight proper nouns (i.e. card names). This means that you can’t affect a “Black Vise”.
Can target a card with no color words on it.
Can’t change a color word to the same color word. It must be a different word.
Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.

Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.

Players play with their hands revealed.

cards.name: Deflection
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
cards.flavor:
Up and down,
over and through,
back around—
the joke's on you.

rulings.text: The target of a spell that targets another spell on the stack can be changed to any other spell on the stack, even if the new target will resolve before the spell does.
You can’t make a spell which is on the stack target itself.

You can choose to make a spell on the stack target this spell (if such a target choice would be legal had the spell been cast while this spell was on the stack). The new target for the deflected spell is not chosen until this spell resolves. This spell is still on the stack when new targets are selected for the spell.
Once the spell resolves, the new target is considered to be targeted by the deflected spell. This will trigger any effects which trigger on being targeted.
This does not check if the current target is legal. It just checks if the spell has a single target.
You choose the spell to target on announcement, but you pick the new target for that spell on resolution.
If there is no other legal target for the spell, this does not change the target.
This only targets the spell being changed, not the original or new target of the spell it is affecting.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Deflection, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Deflection.

cards.name: Desertion
cards.text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
cards.flavor: First the insult, then the injury.

rulings.text: The card is put onto the battlefield, but any effects that check if the original card was “cast from your hand” will not trigger or otherwise consider the card to have been cast from your hand. The card was put onto the battlefield by the effect of Desertion instead.
This spell includes a replacement effect. If the target is an artifact or creature, it never goes to the graveyard.
If the spell is not countered (because the spell it targets can’t be countered), then this card’s ability does not put the card onto the battlefield. The spell continues to resolve as normal.

rulings.text: Each player chooses to draw any number of cards from zero to seven. First the player whose turn it is chooses how many cards to draw, then draws those cards, then each other player in turn order does the same.
Diminishing Returns won’t be put into your graveyard until after it’s finished resolving, which means it won’t be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.
The exiled cards are exiled face up. You’ll see them before you choose how many cards to draw.

cards.name: Flash
cards.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

rulings.text: If the creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
Only the generic mana in that creature’s mana cost is reduced. For example, if that creature’s mana cost is {1}{R}, you’ll have to pay {R} to keep it.
The creature enters the battlefield, so it will trigger enters-the-battlefield abilities even if you choose not to pay.

If you choose not to pay, the creature is sacrificed immediately. No player will get priority in between the creature entering the battlefield and being sacrificed. Sacrificing the creature this way will trigger any abilities that trigger when it leaves the battlefield, and those abilities will be put onto the stack at the same time as those that triggered when it entered the battlefield.
